idea: We are an Indian-owned and operated freight forwarding business with a corporate office in Mumbai. Collectively, we have a vast knowledge when it comes to International Freight Forwarding, and with a multitude of global networking affiliations, We have contacts worldwide ready to assist you with all your freight and logistics requirements. We have the knowledge and expertise to manage your requests from arranging collections from your supplier to delivering to your final destination and everything in between. Let our dedicated staff manage the whole process for you, giving you peace of mind to ensure to smooth transaction every time.
name: One Freight Forwarders Pvt Ltd

idea:
"We have built a company that combines the execution power of an advertising agency with the strategic insights of a consultancy firm.

As an extension of your team, we are not only experts in what we do but want to become experts in what you do. We provide custom end-to-end solutions within marketing consulting, media and content. Our product suites enable marketing teams to gain full transparency into their campaign performance data as well as any social sentiment analytics."

idea: We work with our clients to design optimal organization structures, roles, and responsibilities. We help them hire the right people and advise them on how to reward and motivate their workforce while developing professionals as they navigate and advance their careers.

idea:
PG Spices is the premium exporter of Spices and Dry-fruits worldwide. The only exporter to provide top-of-the-line quality handpicked and organically chosen Spices and Dry-fruits. When it comes to cooking for loved ones or cooking like a professional, the moms and chefs recommend PG Spices for the delicious mouth-watering food.

Our mission is to acquire the trust and satisfaction of customers through the variety of best products we have. Our highly experienced and skilled staff is keen on delivering our products with the industry's best practices, complete transparency in work, and matching expectations beyond Consumer aspects.
name: P G SPICES EXPORTS
